key.name: center-hotkey
key.summary: Hotkey to center the active window
key.description: The keybinding that will trigger the extension to move the currently focused window to the center of its monitor. Default is Alt+Shift+C.

key.name: center-horizontal
key.description: Whether to center the window horizontally.

key.name: center-vertical
key.description: Whether to center the window vertically.
